topics.body:
In some manga or anime, there is the usually pretty young girl who's perfect at everything, loved by everyone yada yada Mary Sue.
But then she goes home and acts completely different or when she's with her closer friends, she makes mistakes all the time or just generally clumsy.

I'm sure someone like this actually exists.
